<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.TeamDevBackoutVisible</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Used by Team Dev Back Out UI Action and Notice business rule</description> <name>TeamDevBackoutVisible</name> <script><![CDATA[var TeamDevBackoutVisible = Class.create(); TeamDevBackoutVisible.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractUpdateUIActionUtil, { initialize: function() { },
